title: LFM: New Rank 5's Team Looking For Recruits
body:
I am a mid main creating a new ranked 5's team. If you're looking to join please provide the following (copy and paste it)
1. Summoner Name-
2. Where You Placed In Promos-
3. Current Rank-
4. Earlier Season Ranks (if available)-
5. Roles In Descending Order- (Ex.) MID > JG > TOP = ADC > SUPPORT
6. Your Time Zone-
7. Skype- Yes or No?
8. When You Are Able To Play (specific times please!)-
9. Main Champs-
10. Please Provide Your OP.GG/LoLKing Link

I am looking to play from 4pm EST- 9pm EST (1pm-6pm PST) on Monday-Thursday. We will only occasionally be playing on Fridays and over the weekend. Team name will be debated between all members once found.

replies.body:
1. Summoner Name- Icurli
2. Where You Placed In Promos- Bronze
3. Current Rank- Bronze
4. Earlier Season Ranks - Season 4: Silver and Season 5 Bronze
5. Roles In Descending Order- Support > JG > AD >Top > < Mid
6. Your Time Zone- Mountain time
7. Skype- Yes 
8. When You Are Able To Play - Anytime
9. Main Champs- Thresh, Janna (champion pool still expanding)
10. http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Icurli
